CustomField.formula: SUBSTITUTE(TRIM( IF(NOT(ISBLANK(OrganizationAttribute__c )),OrganizationAttribute__c ,'') +IF(NOT(ISBLANK(CountryAttribute__c )),'_'+CountryAttribute__c ,'') +IF(NOT(ISBLANK( DistrictAttribute__c )),'_'+ SUBSTITUTE(DistrictAttribute__c , CountryAttribute__c+'_', '') ,'') +IF(NOT(ISBLANK( ProfitCenterAttribute__c )),'_'+ProfitCenterAttribute__c ,'') +IF(NOT(ISBLANK( OfficeAttribute__c )),'_'+SUBSTITUTE(OfficeAttribute__c , CountryAttribute__c+'-', ''),'') +IF(NOT(ISBLANK( CustomerSegmentAttribute__c )),'_'+CustomerSegmentAttribute__c ,'') +IF(AND(ISBLANK( CustomerSegmentAttribute__c ),NOT(ISBLANK( BusinessTypeAttribute__c ))),'_'+BusinessTypeAttribute__c ,'') ),' ', '_')
CustomField.label: Service Attribute
